# xelon_firewall (Data Source)

The firewall data source provides information about an existing Xelon firewall.

Firewalls provide network security and routing between internal and external networks.

## Example Usage

### Using name

```terraform
data "xelon_firewall" "main" {
  name = "production-firewall"
}
```

### Using ID

```terraform
data "xelon_firewall" "main" {
  id = "fw-12345"
}
```

### Using ID and name for validation

```terraform
data "xelon_firewall" "main" {
  id   = "fw-12345"
  name = "production-firewall"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of the firewall.
- `name` (String) The firewall name.

### Read-Only

- `cloud_id` (String) The cloud ID where the firewall is deployed.
- `tenant_id` (String) The tenant ID that owns the firewall.
- `internal_ipv4_address` (String) The internal IPv4 address.
- `external_ipv4_address` (String) The external IPv4 address.
